text: If anything I consider myself non-violent, I'm from the hippy era, peace, love, groovy.
author: Rick James

text: You have to make peace with yourself. The key is to find the harmony in what you have.
author: Naomi Watts

text: I've been there and done all that, sold millions of records, and that doesn't bring you peace.
author: Michael W. Smith

text: Looking back, there is nothing wrong with that peace, love and equality that the hippies espoused. In many ways, we have regressed because they were into organic food, back to nature, make love not war, be good to all men, share and share alike - which is what many are talking about now.
author: Imelda Staunton

text: I think no one could have made peace in Bosnia besides Holbrooke.
author: Michael Ignatieff
